article_title: First Trial of Accused Islamic State Attack Plotter Goes to Jury
article_text:
An Arizona jury will continue deliberating this week on the fate of the first alleged plotter of an Islamic State attack to go to trial in the U.S., in a test case for the Justice Department.

Prosecutors allege that Abdul Malik Abdul Kareem helped plan an attack in which two gunmen opened fire on a controversial event in Garland, Texas, last year billed as a contest for the best cartoon of the Prophet Muhammad. Islamic State claimed...

article_summary:
Islamic State claimed...
An Arizona jury will continue deliberating this week on the fate of the first alleged plotter of an Islamic State attack to go to trial in the U.S., in a test case for the Justice Department.
Prosecutors allege that Abdul Malik Abdul Kareem helped plan an attack in which two gunmen opened fire on a controversial event in Garland, Texas, last year billed as a contest for the best cartoon of the Prophet Muhammad.
